articles.summary: Meta is bringing its AI translation tool to Facebook and Instagram. It automatically dubs your reels into another language. For now, you can only translate your reel from English to another language, but soon it will be available in other languages too.

articles.title: How the ‘tech titans' can save Social Security
articles.author: The Hill
articles.summary: Some Silicon Valley's elite believe the artificial intelligence boom will generate massive wealth even though it displaces millions of workers. Their solution is to use the newly generated wealth from AI to provide a universal basic that will automate most production and the public can share in the revenue.

articles.title: Gates Funds $1 Million AI Alzheimer's Prize
articles.author: Slashdot
articles.summary: Bill Gates is funding a $1 million competition to use AI to find innovative treatments for Alzheimer's disease. The winner will be a team that is capable of independent planning, reasoning, and action to accelerate breakthrough discoveries from existing Alzheimer's data. The competition is the latest effort to deploy the promising technology to find cures for humanity's toughest illnesses.

articles.title: AI isn't just replacing tasks. It's replacing the office, the manager, and maybe even the mission
articles.author: Fast Company
articles.summary: A new study by GoTo and Workplace Intelligence found that 51% of employees believe AI will eventually make a difference in the workplace. It surveyed 2,500 global employees and IT leaders and found that AI is no longer just a workplace tool, but a tool of the future.

articles.title: Authorities warn of fake AI police, prosecutor scams
articles.author: Taipei Times
articles.summary: Criminal Investigation Bureau reports an average of 530 fraud cases per day last month, with daily losses reaching $1.5 million. Criminals are using artificial intelligence to impersonate police and prosecutors, according to CIB's report. CIB reports an increase in criminals using sophisticated artificial intelligence (AI).

articles.title: 1,000 teachers to be deployed for UAE's first Artificial Intelligence curriculum
articles.author: Gulf News
articles.summary: The UAE will introduce its first nationally developed artificial intelligence curriculum in public schools this fall. More than 1,000 trained teachers will be employed to teach coding and algorithms. It is part of an ambitious effort to prepare students for a technology-driven future.

articles.title: What's behind the TikTok accounts using AI-generated versions of real Latino journalists?
articles.author: NBC News
articles.summary: The accounts point to the challenge of stopping or controlling the surge in fake images and misinformation targeting Spanish-speakers in the U.S. as AI technology advances. The accounts are written by Spanish-speaking people living in the United States. They are not responsible for the content of the posts.
